fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Rumors: For each player you Kill, gain a negative vote.
- Chameleon: You appear to win with Order.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Gossip: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [Infinite uses, 2 CD] 
- Frame: Select a player to appear as a different role for this phase. [3 uses, Graveyard]
- Unearth: Choose a player. Learn their true role. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Fearmonger: All investigative information (barring trues) will give incorrect information in the next phase. [1 use, Unique, Graveyard]
